content.question: The images show a plan and a view of the early Christian mausoleum known as Santa Costanza.Using specific visual evidence, analyze both how the building’s design served its original function and how its design incorporates elements from earlier building types.

frqParts.text: The images show a plan and a view of the early Christian mausoleum known as Santa Costanza.Using specific visual evidence, analyze both how the building’s design served its original function and how its design incorporates elements from earlier building types.

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
